welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Calhoun, a charming city known for its southern hospitality and historical landmarks. We invite you to explore and experience all the beauty and attractions our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Richard B Russell Airport is a small, single-story building with limited amenities.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Richard B Russell Airport is a small, separate building used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cartersville Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
